name: Max's Big Bust - A Captain Nekorai Tale
description: Max's Big Bust is a Life Sim/Visual Novel that follows the story of two cops, Max and Brad, as they investigate a shady new drug that's been circulating the mean streets of Axon City.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 Storage: 2 GB available space
